TextBlock.Text: BOBER: Turns out this purple moon is quantum. It's also made of a drug from our species named Lean, so we'll go with that name.
BILLY: Bober, stop explaining what this is. We have just landed here, let's explore.
KATHERYNE: Wait, what the hell is that thing?
BOBER: Holy sh... That's an engraving in the stone! It looks hexagonal...
BILLY: No shit sherlock. Assuming we read this from top-left and then right and down, like our coordinate blocks on the Vessel, this pattern reads as middle-left, bottom-left.
KATHERYNE: There is another engraving on top! It looks eerily like the Troll Face Planet. Maybe we should wait until the moon starts orbiting that planet, then re-enter it?
BOBER: You are a genius! What if the surface of the moon changes based on what planet it orbits? Maybe another engraving will show up if it orbits the Troll Face Planet!
*REMINDER: GO TO THE NORTH POLE (RED HEMISPHERE) FOR EVERY LEAN VARIANT*
